long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 AI Search Extension - Search selected text on ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity

Unlock the power of AI instantly with the AI Search Extension! 🎉 

This free extension lets you search selected text across popular AI platforms like ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity in just a few clicks. Perfect for quick insights, learning, and research on any topic!

🌟 How to Use:

=> Select text you want to search.
=> Right-click and choose "Search with AI."
=> Pick your AI platform: ChatGPT 💬, Claude 🤖, or Perplexity 🔍.
=> A new tab will open with your search results on the chosen AI platform.

✨ Features:

=> 100% Free 🆓
=> Instant AI-powered answers from ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity.
=> No login required—just select, click, and explore!
=> Take your curiosity to the next level with this free and easy-to-use extension! 🚀
